灤字的基本解释

灤
luán
见“滦”。

灤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［luán］
［《廣韻》落官切，平桓，來。］
“滦1”的繁体字。
水名。古名濡水。在河北省东北部。上源闪电河出丰宁县，绕经内蒙古自治区东南缘多伦县北，折向东南流，始称滦河。中游穿流燕山山地。下游在乐亭、昌黎两县间入渤海。

灤字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灤； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页664第19
【廣韻】落官切【集韻】【韻會】盧丸切【正韻】盧官切，?音鸞。漏流也。與灓同。　又水名。【廣輿記】灤河，在永平府。　又州名。【廣輿記】直?永平府灤州，商孤竹國，漢海陽，五代灤州。

Luan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［luán］
["Guang Yun" cut off the official, Ping Huan, come. ]
Traditional characters for "Luan 1".
Water name. The ancient name is Rushui. In the northeast of Hebei Province. The Shangyuan Lightning River flows out of Fengning County, passes through the north of Duolun County on the southeastern margin of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, turns to the southeast, and was originally called the Luan River. The middle reaches pass through Yanshan Mountain. The lower reaches enter the Bohai Sea between Laoting and Changli counties.
Luan

[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　 Luan; Kangxi Strokes: 27; Page Number: Page 664 Page 19
[Guang Yun] Laoguan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Lu Wan cut [Zheng Yun] Lu Guan cut,? Yin Luan. Leakage also. Same as Yun.　Also known as water. [Guang Yu Ji] Luan River, in Yongping Mansion.　Also the name of the state. [Guang Yu Ji] Zhi? Yongping Mansion Luanzhou, Shanggu Zhuguo, Han Haiyang, the Five Dynasties Luanzhou.
